main event: A witness observed a large orange-red object in the sky, which hovered for approximately 10 minutes before disappearing.
interesting points: The object emitted a whistling sound during the observation,The object appeared to shimmer and had what looked like control lights,Observers included a civilian and two children who saw the object at different times,The object was described as being round and approximately 25 to 30 feet in diameter,The conclusion reached by the report is that the object was a hot air balloon, as it was consistent with a weather balloon launched from a nearby Air Force base.
witness description: A civilian female driving near the vicinity of Kerby School.
